text: @DrRPNishank @cbseindia29 @narendramodi @AmitShah @PMOIndia @HMOIndia @HRDMinistry @mygovindia @transformIndia @PIB_India @MIB_India @DDNewslive I,student of GNDU & all our students are not ready to come for final semester exams in this covid-19 outbreak. many universities are cancelling exams for safety of students like Odisha, Maharashtra & ALL IIT's,NIIT's, so GNDU must cancel & promote students for safety
